issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201312191547
Xcode 5.0.2 iOS 7.0.2

The titanium samples give the following error for iOS:

Available Titanium SDKs:
[ERROR] :  Invalid selected Titanium SDK "3.1.3.GA"
    3.2.0.GA

'Favebooks' example does not work for iOS.

Also, Studio Dashboard -> Develop -> Import does not work either.

Can you provide assistance to get the samples running please?
fields.summary: Titanium samples don't run on latest version of titanium

comments.body:
The FaveBooks sample code has been updated, which might resolve the issues you found with that application.
http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Creating_Your_First_Titanium_App

Can you specify what other sample/s you are trying to import? Please provide steps, thanks.

This error indicates that you may not have 3.1.3 GA SDK installed. You may want to update the sdk-version in tiapp.xml to point to the SDK you have installed. For example, 

change,
<sdk-version>3.1.3.GA</sdk-version>
to,
<sdk-version>3.2.0.GA</sdk-version>
Thank you for your response. I finally got this working by reverting to 3.1.2 then upgrading to 3.2.
